scripts.build:windows: npm run build && rm -r wails/picow-rgbw/frontend/src/* && cp -r dist/* wails/picow-rgbw/frontend/src/ && cd wails/picow-rgbw && wails build && wails build -nsis
scripts.build:linux: npm run build && rm -r wails/picow-rgbw/frontend/src/* && cp -r dist/* wails/picow-rgbw/frontend/src/ && cd wails/picow-rgbw && wails build
scripts.build:android: npm run build && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
